specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric. Mechanical > Crushed Crushed is a post-processing method that creates a creased or crumpled effect. It gives the fabric a naturally wrinkled texture, adding depth, visual interest, and a casual, vintage-inspired look.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Charmeuse This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Acetate This fabric is easy to damage, so be careful when handling it and keep it dry. It may shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store it in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Dresses, Pajamas, Partywear, Abaya
